description:
If you look in:
scheduler/driver.py

The live_migration call is still made without using the RPC API.
It also still uses instance_id

The cast_to_* methods can also be removed at the same time.
title: live_migration call made without using RPC API

comments.content:

The live_migration call is still made without using the RPC API.
It also still uses instance_id
